CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 3, 1962, pg. 2, reads: "Cream Of The Crop - Representative of some of the best Pittsburgh has to offer the future are these six youngsters, shown with two of their mentors, who were named winners of $500 scholarship awards at The Courier's recent Appreciation Day Rally at Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall...Center photo shows Mrs. Victoria Hargon of the Urban League, who served as chairman of the committee of outstanding educators and youth workers who selected the winners from more than 50 applicants."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Victoria Hargon, standing between two men, posed in Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall, for Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper's Appreciation Day Rally
CatSubject_tab: Hargon, Victoria.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
